definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to have a fluent command of (idiom)

sentences.english: Use the concept map to promote dialogue and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 运用概念图，促进对话与合作。

sentences.english: Arced lines are frequently used in Chinese-style design.
sentences.chinese: 弧形的线条在中国风的设计中运用颇多。

sentences.english: Will you please use your influence with him not to do it?
sentences.chinese: 请你运用你的影响力叫他不要做那事好吗？

sentences.english: Applying the market rule to electronic unfair competition disputes is not always easy.
sentences.chinese: 运用该市场规律来消除电子不正当竞争并不容易。

sentences.english: The article conducts the research using method of the quota statistics and qualitative analysis.
sentences.chinese: 文章运用定量统计和定性分析的方法进行研究。

sentences.english: But how can I apply to practice?
sentences.chinese: 但是我如何才能运用于实践呢？

sentences.english: Boccaccino recommends that you use professional nursing combed wool.
sentences.chinese: 卡奇诺引荐您运用专业的羊毛护理梳。

sentences.english: But they use game theory to reward good translations with badges, yes?
sentences.chinese: 不过译言有运用博弈论，好的翻译会得证章，对吧？

sentences.english: Experiments show the proper application of this method can improve the effects of shot-put teaching.
sentences.chinese: 经过实验研究，合理运用可以优化教学效果。

sentences.english: Stylist was not immersed in general understanding to apply this to behave gimmick. However painterly combination effect.
sentences.chinese: 设计师没有陷入一般理解去运用这一表现手法。

sentences.english: You use all of your senses in guided imagery.
sentences.chinese: 在进行引导式景象刻画时，你要运用到一切感官。

sentences.english: Widdowson ever criticized, "Structuralism focuses on language analysis and only reflects one aspect of communicative competence."
sentences.chinese: 而交际法有，过于恰恰相反注重语言在语境中的运用。

sentences.english: This will improve your phrase-slinging ability.
sentences.chinese: 这可以帮助你提高灵活运用词汇的能力。

sentences.english: Its bifurcation characteristics are studied using the numerical integral method.
sentences.chinese: 运用数值积分法研究了系统的分岔特性。

sentences.english: His narrative is a super rendering of dialect speech and idiom.
sentences.chinese: 他的叙述是方言和土语最成功的运用。

sentences.english: Still, there's reason to be cautious aboutthe findings.
sentences.chinese: 然而，运用这个发现的成果仍需要谨慎。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app

in addition/moreover/(used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to grasp (often fig.)/to control/to seize (initiative, opportunity, destiny)/to master/to know well/to understand sth well and know how to use it/fluency
to draw support from/with the help of
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to extract (ore, minerals etc)/to refine/to purify/to process
to exploit/to make use of/to use/to take advantage of/to utilize
